Package camzup.pfriendly

Class CamEntity3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity3
camzup.pfriendly.CamEntity3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IOriented3, ISpatial3, IUtils
public class CamEntity3 extends Entity3
An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.

  • Constructor Details

    • CamEntity3

      public CamEntity3()
      The default constructor.

    • CamEntity3

      public CamEntity3(String name)
      Constructs a named entity. A new transform is created by the constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name

    • CamEntity3

      public CamEntity3(String name, Transform3 transform)
      Constructs a named entity with a transform. The transform is assigned by reference, and so it can be changed outside the entity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      transform - the transform

    • CamEntity3

      public CamEntity3(Transform3 transform)
      Constructs an entity with a transform. The transform is assigned by reference, and so it can be changed outside the entity.
      Parameters:
      transform - the transform

  • Method Details

    • frustum

      public CamEntity3 frustum(PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
      Sets a renderer projection matrix to the frustum defined by the edges of the view port.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      left - the left edge of the window
      right - the right edge of the window
      bottom - the bottom edge of the window
      top - the top edge of the window
      near - the near clip plane
      far - the far clip plane
      Returns:
      this entity
